actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the disapproval of the Congress with respect to the delegation of functions of the Office of Economic Opportunity to other Government agencies.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of Congress of all proposals contained in the budget of the United States Government for the fiscal year 1974 with respect to the delegation to other agencies of the Government of functions of the Office of Economic Opportunity.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the disapproval of the Congress with respect to the delegation of functions of the Office of Economic Opportunity to other Government agencies.
